title: 03/05/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/05/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the boys open with the discussion around Big Ben sticking around for one more season in Pittsburgh while also taking a lower salary than last season. Pro Football Talk’s Mike Florio came on the show in the first hour to talk about the signing along with possible rule changes that teams may want to see implemented moving forward. ESPN NBA reporter Tim MacMahon joined the show in the second hour to talk about the All-Star game festivities as well as how the MVP race and Lakers situation continues to move forward. Lastly, NBA on TNT’s Ernie Johnson joined in the final hour to talk about the award-winning show "Inside the NBA” and how it came to be and the new documentary series about the show”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
